content.rendered:
ABOUT US

Brief History

The name ‘CROWE‘ is derived from the name of a company registered as Crown Worldwide Events Limited, of which Crowe Group of Schools is a subsidiary.
The vision of the school came in the year 2000. The school is located in Iwo City in Osun State, Nigeria and the exact venue is the current location KM3, Iwo Ejigbo Road. Foundations and construction began in 2002. The school started academic operation on the 26th of September, 2009.
Before this time, (precisely in 2008), another portion of land was acquired in addition to the one that housed the school. About 4.5 hectares of land, which is 500 meters away from the school site. This land is to house an international football academy and the boarding students.
Crowe schools are located in a beautiful and serene environment, conducive for teaching and learning in all ramifications. Amenities and infrastructural facilities are of international standard.
However, the vision of the school was abrupted and brought to a halt, due to the painful demise of the principal founders in 2015 and 2016 respectively, This brought the school to a deteriorating state. After many years of poor management and reckless administration, the board of directors thought it good to lease the school in 2020. This decision pedaled in new season for the school.
The new management under the leadership of Mr. Adetayo A. ALLI, an educational consultant and an academic echelon, has brought about new look, restructuring, and an unprecedented awakening to the school.
The new management, among many other things done to reawaken the school is the rebranding of the school logo, a touch of change on the school uniform to give it a new look, creation of a continuous and relevant vision and mission statement for the school, renovation and revitalization of the school laboratories and ICT room, and hiring of highly effective and qualified teachers. Of which positive results have began to stream in.
Within this short period of time under the new management, CROWE SCHOOLS of today, now stands shoulder to shoulder with her counterparts on academic grounds globally…

Our Mission

To raise scholars with high level of excellence, through the dissemination of relevant and contemporary knowledge that will enhance their capacity to make the world a better place.

Our Vision

Crowe Schools shall be an internationally recognized citadel of learning, that is committed to raising excellent and morally sound problem-solving scholars.

School Anthem

There's a rock solid learning Citadel With a solid base like a Gibraltar There's a school that stands out as a model And a future leader Alma mater There's a place to be fit as a fiddle Where physical and mental growth matters There's a place where moral never dwindles, but boost knowledge and make future brighter Crowe Schools will never fail To raise students that all hails Crowe Schools will ever pass Sound knowledge to students En Mass. ***Crowe Schools, Leading with Cognition!***
There's a rock solid learning Citadel With a solid base like a Gibraltar There's a school that stands out as a model And a future leader Alma mater There's a place to be fit as a fiddle Where physical and mental growth matters There's a place where moral never dwindles, but boost knowledge and make future brighter Crowe Schools will never fail To raise students that all hails Crowe Schools will ever pass Sound knowledge to students En Mass. ***Crowe Schools, Leading with Cognition!***

Management Staff

You will find our staff to be warm, friendly and committed when you visit our school.
Don’t be surprised to see us being very strict, or laughing out loud! Both of these elements fit firmly within our values.

Adetayo A. ALLI

Director

Moses A. Jessey

Registrar & Head of ADMIN

Olalere P. Olaoluwa

Bursar

Adeola Kayode

Supervisor

Teaching Staff

The quality of our staff is the main factor that Crowe International Schools rely on to be improved so rapidly and to have competitive advantage over its competitors.
Our staff are recruited through highly rigorous processes that ensure they are of a standard we expect at Crowe International Schools.

Teacher #1

Form Teacher: JSS1

Teacher #2

Form Teacher: JSS2

Teacher #3

Form Teacher: JSS3

Teacher #4

Form Teacher: SS1

Teacher #5

Form Teacher: SS2

More About Us

Crowe International Schools, Iwo, Osun State is a Government Approved Elementary, Middle and High School Committed to Building and Grooming Future Leaders, Facilitating Creative and Innovative Ideas, Promoting Religious and Ethnic Tolerance and Setting the Pace for others to model.
It is not just an Institution excellent in Learning but also in Character.
Previous
Next
Previous
Next

Welcome Message

Welcome to Crowe International Schools, we are a private Nursery, Primary and Secondary School located in Iwo, Osun State of Nigeria.
Over the years we have continued to facilitate the development of young minds and our academic success is recognised nationally.
We are a place where students thrive knowing that they are loved, here they develop a thirst for learning and a sincere love for God.
At Crowe International Schools, we inspire each child to achieve their God given individual personal excellence.
As a result, they grow to become valuable members of our global community.
Guided by the Nigerian Education Curriculum, we cater for children aged 18 months to young adults aged 18 years.

Download App

Download our Mobile App to easily access the school portal.
